text: How agents can adopt optimism and pessimism to learn to solve high-stakes tasks and avoid learning harmful behaviors. This project is based on my Master's thesis.

header: Visual Multitask Prediction for Autonomous Driving
text: Developed a convolutional neural network model for depth estimation and class segmentation from RGB images.

header: Dynamics Analysis of a Rolling Disk
text: I was always curious why a wheels/coins fall so easily while standing still, but are so stable while rolling. So I did a brief stability analysis.
